alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Campbell County through 515 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles north of Spotted Horse to 3 miles northwest of Gillette Airport to near Pine Tree Junction. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gillette Airport around 430 PM MDT. Wright around 445 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Weston. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 96 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
